paper_abstract: In the paper we deal with lower bounds constructed for the asymptotic competitive ratio of semi-online bin packing and batched bin packing algorithms.We determine the bounds as the solutions of a related nonlinear optimization problem using theoretical analysis and a reliable numerical global optimization method. Our results improve the lower bounds given in Gutin et al. (Discrete Optim 2:71-82, 2005) for some special cases of the batched bin packing problem.
paper_title: Improved lower bounds for semi-online bin packing problems
